name: Should I Retake? - BRACU CGPA Calculator
description: Free BRACU CGPA calculator for BRAC University students. Upload PDF grade sheet or Excel file to calculate CGPA, analyze grades, and determine if you should retake courses. Features include grade analysis, course retake recommendations, and 100% client-side processing.
keywords: bracu cgpa calculator, brac university cgpa calculator, bracu cg calculator, cgpa calculator bracu, brac cgpa calculator, bracu gpa calculator, bracu grade calculator, cgpa calculation bracu, should i retake, grade analysis tool, academic planning
